page.title: 10LIKES AND DISLIKES IN FLEET
page.content:
{What I like}in Fleet is the fresh air and the peace and quiet. It's convenient to have a station in Fleet so you can get to London quickly. I like all the parks; in Fleet we have three. The Views is pleasant and quiet so you can go for a walk without being disturbed. I like the{range of shops that include almost every sort of shop except a large departmental store.
{What I dislike}is that Fleet does not have enough sports' facilities and there are too many trees. The worst omission is that there is no swimming pool. I do not like the new Council Offices being built on The Views. My final dislike is the traffic; I think there should be a pedestrian precinct. More{public transport}is also needed at a cheaper price.
